Bosses.Name: Ifrit
Bosses.Strategy:
Most of this fights mechanics are usually skipped due to the high amount of damage dealt from the party.

Below 75%% HP: Ifrit will periodically use Eruption.

Below 50%% HP: Ifrit will spawn an infernal nail that should be destroyed.

Below 25%% HP: Eruption will create non-targeted AoEs.
